ai-atk-vin02a310:1_0: Discussion of the lesser training rules
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_1: Where the chapter on the group of five hundred
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_2: The four rules entailing expulsion, the rest is the ninety-two rules, the rest is one thing, the for the future, and the rest is of the arrivals. Instead of cases all kinds as a way.
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_3: this is what the ascetics who follow the Sakyan.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_0: They said, “You have done this before, Reverend Ānanda, this was the order of you.” But the senior monk who was given a sufficient and improper conduct, said, “It’s not solely done by the senior venerable.”
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_1: For those waters don’t know the offenses
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_2: For this is said in the Paṭisambhidā:
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_3: “There is no decrease when one doesn’t exist.”
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_4: Confess that wrong conduct, that monk claims to be dealt with investigated, saying, “Thoses it,” “It’s when I talked about it,” he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_5: But if the elder asked, “If not because he does not ask, therefore it is inappropriate for a lay person, I will question her.” But he said, “I won’t show it in this way,” and he said, “I’ll give a teaching to the senior venerables.”
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_6: You answer according to what you are said.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_7: the rest are in four situations.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_8: Herein, what is called construction should be spoken here as to,
ai-atk-vin02a310:4_0: The training rule on lesser training rules
ai-atk-vin02a310:5_0: The chapter on the group of five hundred is finished.
